message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you a small amount to get us started.
You're being too stingy, let's meet in the middle!
I'm not sure I'm ready to meet in the middle just yet. I'd like to see if I can get a better deal.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve a larger share.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more!
I'm not willing to give up more than 3000. I think I can do better than that.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more. This is my final offer.
